member_organisations:
Ecma has about 70 members, only relevant organizations can be members, but we have no individual membership. 
Latest status: 
www.ecma-international.org 
members
fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Environment, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives: ICT Standardisation policy multi-stakeholder platform. This platform is operated by DG GROW and DG CONNECT. Members are the Member States and the various standardization organization or ICT related interest groups. Ecma is one of the standardization organizations, founded in 1961 in Geneva, Switzerland.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Create and maintain Standards in the area of Information Technology, Telecommunication Technology and Consumer Electronics
relevant_communication: See list of Ecma deliverables (standards and technical reports) under www.ecma-international.org. We publish on our website all Ecma relevant standardization information, including our final products, the standards and technical reports that anybody can download free of charge.
